sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' export default function AboutPage() { return (
{/*

This is a website made by broke gamblers, for broke gamblers.

*/}

Instructions:

First, you will want to create an account. You will be given 100 betting points. These are fictitious units with no monetary value. (But a heck of a lot of pride value!)

Use your betting points to bet on your favorite sport! (Provided that sport is soccer, basketball, baseball, hockey, or football)

Scroll over the "select league" dropdown at the top of this page and choose a league.

Next, browse through the "Upcoming Games" in your selected league and choose a winner for any game in which you are confident about the outcome.

After you select a game, the game will appear on the right side of the page. Here, choose the amount of betting points you'd like to spend.

This is a "NO ODDS CASINO" meaning regardless of the point spread, if you win your bet you will win the amount of betting points you placed on that game.

Finally, select your profile at the top of the page to see your submitted games and the points you bet on them.

We get our sports data through a crowd-sourced database. Please be patient with the results.

Speaking of our sports data, head on over to https://www.thesportsdb.com/ and support them!

GOOD LUCK AND MAY THE BETTING POINTS BE EVER IN YOUR FAVOR

) }
